summary: Imperial Investigator Armor UNP by Calyps, updated, bug fixed, and modernized for 2017 (and SSE).
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]
Imperial Investigator Armor UNP 2017 ([/size][size=3]Updated[/size][size=5])
[/size]Original mod by Calyps
[size=3]

[color=#ffff00]Features\Improvements\Issues addressed[/color]

 Improved naming - better sorting and presentation
 Improved crafting recipes. The recipes now better reflect the end result.( not tempering). 
 Coats-Boots-Gloves now require Elven Crafting 
Fixed the two dustcloaks that were not displaying properly - Khaki and Light Grey.
Removed the keyword and other misplaced records that served no purpose
and also, conflicted with Hearthfire.
ESP Updated for current CK

No changes were made to textures or meshes. 
The original mod, is called Imperial Investigator Armor.
I refer to it as Investigator Armor for brevity'


Updating the 2012 version.

The 2012 ESP name has been retained. All you need to do, is uninstall the 2012 version, and install this in its place.

All credit to [url=https://old.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1006539/?]Calyps[/url]
[/size][/center]
author: Mebantiza - Calyps
